description: This file declares functions related to DHCP server configuration, including preparation of DHCP ranges, static hosts, options, and DNS settings.

methods.name: prepare_hostname
methods.description: Prepares or retrieves the DHCP hostname configuration.

methods.name: calculate_dhcp_range
methods.description: Calculates the DHCP IP address range and outputs configuration.

methods.name: prepare_dhcp_conf_static_hosts
methods.description: Prepares static host entries for DHCP configuration.

methods.name: prepare_dhcp_options_wan_dns
methods.description: Prepares DHCP options specific to WAN DNS settings.

methods.name: prepare_whitelist_urls
methods.description: Prepares URL whitelists for DHCP configuration.

methods.name: do_extra_pools
methods.description: Handles additional DHCP pools based on event and DNS settings.

methods.name: prepare_dhcp_conf
methods.description: Prepares the overall DHCP server configuration.

methods.name: check_and_get_wan_dhcp_dns
methods.description: Checks and retrieves WAN DHCP DNS settings.

methods.name: get_dhcp_option_for_brlan0
methods.description: Retrieves DHCP options for the brlan0 interface.

methods.name: prepare_static_dns_urls
methods.description: Prepares static DNS URL entries for DHCP configuration.

methods.name: UpdateDhcpConfChangeBasedOnEvent
methods.description: Updates DHCP configuration based on network events.
